attributes.action: General election to end the turmoil in the UK government
attributes.additional_details: Citizens are concerned about the decrease in purchasing power and overall quality of life due to essential service workers, such as nurses, railways, buses, and school staff, going on strike to demand better pay and working conditions. We must act quickly and find lasting solutions to prevent more harm to our country. The country is facing a cost of living crisis, potentially leading to a recession.
attributes.background: Our country is currently experiencing a cost of living crisis, which could potentially result in a recession if measures are not taken to address the issue.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641904
